description:
Add some extra cushion and rebound to your shoes when pounding the pavement or getting miles in on the trail. These medium to high support insoles provide a stable platform and shock absorption to reduce foot and ankle fatigue.

  • Wicking material with odour control keeps shoes fresh
  • AeroLyte™ Dual Comfort foam layer puts additional cushioning between you and the ground
  • Responsive forefoot zone and cushioned heel provide efficient energy transfer and disperse impact
  • Medium to high arch support
  • Thin profile fits in snug-fitting athletic shoes
name: Superfeet Run Cushion Medium Arch Insoles - Unisex
